Idiomatic_Sent: 大名鼎鼎的曹操曹孟德千里迢迢、风尘仆仆地来到京城，口口声声说是来保护皇帝的，引得大家议论纷纷。

English_Sentence_4o: The renowned Cao Cao, styled Mengde, traveled a long distance with great effort to the capital, repeatedly claiming he was there to protect the emperor, causing widespread discussion.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在这个蓝色的星球上，在我们没有见过的远方，生存着各色各样的人，无论再小的角落，有人的地方，就有梦想。 #绿亦歌#

Idiomatic_Sent: 我捋起袖口，将锅凑到水龙头，冲满水，然后张开“如来神掌”先给它来一招“倒转乾坤”，再来招“天昏地暗”，最后来个“荡气回肠”。一番折腾，累得我“气喘如牛”。

Idiomatic_Sent: 它没有华丽的艳装，只彼一身的葱茏。它已抛弃了幻想，却未老气横秋。那燥热蝉鸣的坦怀，那闪电暴雨的洒脱，便构成了夏日特有的性格。你看，她总是坚实而豪放，在自然界中演绎着一个沉重而卓大不空的角色。

The frankness of the cicada's hot hum, the free spirit of the lightning and rain, all form the unique character of summer. You see, she is always solid and bold, playing a heavy and extraordinary role in nature.

Idiomatic_Sent: 蹉跎了岁月，也蹉跎了我们的心，但我们的意志是坚定的，你是我倾慕的海，是我义无返顾奔赴的海，是至死不变爱着的海！

Idiomatic_Sent: 在春风刚吹起的时节，绿油油的稻子昂首挺胸，颇有少年狂气，随着风的指挥左右摇摆；他曾经历过阳光雨露，也曾经历过暴风骤雨，但柔软的茎却未被折断，待秋天来到他饱含稻穗的头就悄然低下，那里面充满了智慧和感悟。
en_meaning: violent and sudden storm or situation
translation_instruction: '暴风骤雨' means 'violent and sudden storm or situation'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 在春风刚吹起的时节，绿油油的稻子昂首挺胸，颇有少年狂气，随着风的指挥左右摇摆；他曾经历过阳光雨露，也曾经历过暴风骤雨，但柔软的茎却未被折断，待秋天来到他饱含稻穗的头就悄然低下，那里面充满了智慧和感悟。.

Idiomatic_Sent: 你看，它最大的长四米，最小的也有一米，一双炯炯有神的大眼睛虎视眈眈，如此威风凛凛，颇有王者风范，就连鲨鱼也一定视为吴下阿蒙，见一眼中华鲟也得甘拜下风了。

English_Sentence_3.5: The grassland is dyed yellow piece by piece, and the plants also show maturity and hardness, like a squad of sharpshooters wearing armor, standing tall in the wind and rain. The trees are dressed in colorful floral clothes, red, yellow, green, purple... like beautiful girls standing in the autumn wind, breathtakingly beautiful. The falling leaves dance gracefully, like butterflies, incredibly beautiful.

English_Sentence_4o: In frosty weather, double the care, wishing you continuous good fortune, pairs and couples, perfect love, flying together wing to wing, a perfect person, both talented and beautiful, happiness and wealth, hitting two targets with one arrow!

Idiomatic_Sent: 水，那么灵动清丽，令人神往遐思；水，那么雄浑澎湃，充满了无限激情。有时人称柔情似水，有时又说咆哮奔腾，这就是水的个性。瀑布的壮丽，波涛的汹涌，泉水的叮咚，小河的潺潺，全都日夜永恒。
en_meaning: highly appealing or enchanting; makes people feel excited and fascinated
translation_instruction: '令人神往' means 'highly appealing or enchanting; makes people feel excited and fascinated'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 水，那么灵动清丽，令人神往遐思；水，那么雄浑澎湃，充满了无限激情。有时人称柔情似水，有时又说咆哮奔腾，这就是水的个性。瀑布的壮丽，波涛的汹涌，泉水的叮咚，小河的潺潺，全都日夜永恒。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Water, so agile and beautiful, highly appealing and enchanting, makes people feel excited and fascinated; water, so mighty and surging, full of infinite passion. Sometimes referred to as gentle as water, sometimes roaring and rushing, that is the personality of water. The magnificent waterfall, the turbulent waves, the bubbling spring water, the murmuring stream, all eternal day and night.
English_Sentence_4o: The water is so graceful and clear, highly appealing and enchanting; it is so majestic and surging, full of boundless passion. Sometimes it is described as gentle as water, and sometimes as roaring and tumultuous—that is the nature of water. The magnificence of waterfalls, the tumult of waves, the tinkling of springs, and the murmuring of small rivers, all remain eternal day and night.

Idiomatic_Sent: 生活富裕人心畅，祖国处处是舞台。男女老幼都能演，吹拉弹唱样样能。情节故事自己编，雅俗共赏展风采。掌声雷动人喝彩，美满幸福笑开怀。世界戏剧日，祝你生活越过越精彩！
en_meaning: appreciating both refined and popular tastes together
translation_instruction: '雅俗共赏' means 'appreciating both refined and popular tastes together'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 生活富裕人心畅，祖国处处是舞台。男女老幼都能演，吹拉弹唱样样能。情节故事自己编，雅俗共赏展风采。掌声雷动人喝彩，美满幸福笑开怀。世界戏剧日，祝你生活越过越精彩！.
English_Sentence_3.5: Life is rich, hearts are joyful, the whole country is a stage. Men and women, old and young, can all perform, and everyone can sing and dance. We can create our own plots and stories, appreciating both refined and popular tastes together to show our charm. Applause and cheers, happiness and laughter, may your life become increasingly brilliant on World Theatre Day!
English_Sentence_4o: With prosperous lives and joyful hearts, the entire country becomes a stage. Men and women, young and old, can all perform, playing various instruments and singing. They create their own stories and plotlines, showcasing their talents in a way that delights both refined and popular tastes. Thunderous applause and cheers follow, filling hearts with happiness and smiles. On World Theatre Day, may your life become increasingly wonderful!

Idiomatic_Sent: 有很多原因导致人们成为口吃：在学校里受到恐吓；家长过分严厉；由于某件事情受到剧烈的休克反应比如车祸；或者是家庭成员中有口吃者的遗传因素。口吃一般形成于童年时期，并且十之八九多为男性。

Stuttering usually develops in childhood and is on the cards mostly for males.

Stuttering typically develops in childhood, and it is on the cards that it affects males more often than not.

translation_instruction: '扪心自问' means 'To examine one's conscience'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: “我却想不到，你怎么会在这里？”，“历遍苦海，挣出轮回。”，“你扪心自问，真的还有挣出轮回的一天？”，“我历遍苦海，他挣出轮回。”，“为什么……”，“为换回他双目清明，身无瑕垢。”。 #狐离#.
English_Sentence_3.5: "I couldn't have imagined that you would be here."
English_Sentence_4o: "I can't imagine, how could you be here?", "Having traversed the sea of suffering, he escaped the cycle of reincarnation.", "Examine your conscience, do you truly believe there will be a day of escaping the cycle?", "I have traversed the sea of suffering, he escaped the cycle of reincarnation.", "Why…", "To regain his clear sight and pure body." #HuLi#

Idiomatic_Sent: 反动统治阶级巧立名目，在治水、导淮等等幌子下横征暴敛，中饱私囊。

English_Sentence_4o: The reactionary ruling class came up with various excuses and pretexts, imposing heavy taxes and levies under the guise of water control and Huai River management, to fill their own pockets.

Idiomatic_Sent: 小义护亲，父为子隐，子为父隐，亦是美德;大义灭亲，杀忤逆之子，族人认可。
en_meaning: to prioritize and uphold righteousness over family ties or personal relationships
translation_instruction: '大义灭亲' means 'to prioritize and uphold righteousness over family ties or personal relationships'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 小义护亲，父为子隐，子为父隐，亦是美德;大义灭亲，杀忤逆之子，族人认可。.
English_Sentence_3.5: To prioritize and uphold righteousness over family ties or personal relationships is a virtue; killing a disobedient child is accepted by the clan.
English_Sentence_4o: "Minor righteousness protects kin; a father conceals for his son, and a son conceals for his father, which is also a virtue. Major righteousness exterminates kin; killing a rebellious son is recognized by the clan."

Idiomatic_Sent: 可是，专案组的软硬兼施，并没有得到他们想得到的东西，便认定张光年的“顶牛儿”是态度恶劣、顽固不化，他自然受到了更粗暴的对待。

English_Sentence_3.5: However, the task force's use of both soft and hard tactics did not yield the results they were hoping for, so they concluded that Zhang Guangnian's "stubborn resistance" was due to his bad attitude and refusal to budge, leading to him being subjected to even rougher treatment.

Idiomatic_Sent: 这次文艺汇演是多剧种、多流派，百花齐放，各显身手。

Idiomatic_Sent: 由于刚愎自用、偏听偏信而误大事者，历史不乏其例，我们可以以古为鉴，吸取一些有益的教训。

English_Sentence_4o: History is replete with examples of significant mistakes made due to obstinacy and credulity; we can take ancient wisdom as a lesson and draw some beneficial conclusions.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他是那种当面胁肩谄笑.背地里造谣中伤的人.

Idiomatic_Sent: 福祸全在自己一念之间，一念则苍生受益，一念则生灵涂炭。一念之差可以斗转星云，改天换地。一念之差也可以是魔是佛。 #西子情#
en_meaning: a state of great suffering or distress
translation_instruction: '生灵涂炭' means 'a state of great suffering or distress'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 福祸全在自己一念之间，一念则苍生受益，一念则生灵涂炭。一念之差可以斗转星云，改天换地。一念之差也可以是魔是佛。 #西子情#.
English_Sentence_3.5: One thought can bring benefit to all beings, while another can lead to great suffering and distress. A slight change in thought can turn the situation around and change fate. The difference of one thought can create either demons or Buddhas. #WestLakeLove#.
English_Sentence_4o: All blessings or misfortunes hinge on a single thought: one thought benefits the multitude, another plunges beings into great suffering. A moment of difference in thought can change the course of the stars and the heavens, altering reality itself. That same moment of difference can determine whether one is a demon or a Buddha. #XiziQing#

Idiomatic_Sent: 原来小犬忠八是想把秦独武困在幻境中，攻其不备，一招杀敌。

English_Sentence_3.5: Originally, Xiao Quan Zhong Ba wanted to trap Qin Duwu in an illusion, attacking him when he was least prepared, and defeating the enemy with one move.
English_Sentence_4o: It turns out that the loyal dog Zhongba intended to trap Qin Duwu in the illusion, attack him when he was unprepared, and kill him with a single move.

Idiomatic_Sent: 无论苦辣酸甜，让微笑相伴！无论咫尺天涯，让祝福溢满！无论海枯石烂，让真爱永远！亲爱的，生生世世，爱你的心永不变！
en_meaning: being far apart despite being close; a vast distance despite being just a stone's throw away
translation_instruction: '咫尺天涯' means 'being far apart despite being close; a vast distance despite being just a stone's throw away'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 无论苦辣酸甜，让微笑相伴！无论咫尺天涯，让祝福溢满！无论海枯石烂，让真爱永远！亲爱的，生生世世，爱你的心永不变！.
English_Sentence_3.5: No matter the bitterness or sweetness, let smiles accompany us! No matter the vast distance despite being just a stone's throw away, let blessings overflow! No matter if the oceans dry up and the rocks crumble, let true love last forever! My dear, for eternity, my love for you will never change!
English_Sentence_4o: No matter the bitterness, spiciness, sourness, or sweetness, let smiles accompany us! No matter the vast distance despite being close, let blessings overflow! No matter the seas dry up or rocks decay, let true love last forever! My dear, through lifetime after lifetime, my love for you will never change!

Forward the message for blessings of prosperity, longevity, happiness, and success to come by leaps and bounds.

Idiomatic_Sent: 男人要是真心喜欢，可是有不得不慢慢来的苦衷，他会立刻让你知道。他不会让悬着一颗心，因为他自己也要确定会不会因此而心灰意冷，转而另觅良人。
en_meaning: feel disappointed and lose interest
translation_instruction: '心灰意冷' means 'feel disappointed and lose interest'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 男人要是真心喜欢，可是有不得不慢慢来的苦衷，他会立刻让你知道。他不会让悬着一颗心，因为他自己也要确定会不会因此而心灰意冷，转而另觅良人。.
English_Sentence_3.5: If a man truly likes you, but has some difficulties he can't avoid that must be taken slowly, he will let you know right away. He won't keep you hanging, because he needs to figure out whether he will feel disappointed and lose interest, and then look for someone else.
English_Sentence_4o: If a man truly likes you but has legitimate reasons to take things slow, he will let you know immediately. He won't leave you in suspense, because he also needs to ensure that he doesn't feel disappointed and lose interest, leading him to seek someone else.

Idiomatic_Sent: 帮助家庭经济有困难的同学，怎能说是施行小恩小惠，笼络人心，岂有此理!
en_meaning: winning people's hearts; gaining popularity or support by using strategic methods

Idiomatic_Sent: 好朋友一心一意，天涯海角在一起，春夏秋冬共四季，岁月兼程担风雨，话不投机寒风起，良言一句顶三句，亲朋好友常相聚，风吹浪打在一起，知心挚爱有灵犀，惦念深藏在心里，短信互动常联系，祝你晚安甜如蜜！
en_meaning: not having a meeting of minds; unable to communicate effectively; incompatible in conversation
translation_instruction: '话不投机' means 'not having a meeting of minds; unable to communicate effectively; incompatible in conversation'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 好朋友一心一意，天涯海角在一起，春夏秋冬共四季，岁月兼程担风雨，话不投机寒风起，良言一句顶三句，亲朋好友常相聚，风吹浪打在一起，知心挚爱有灵犀，惦念深藏在心里，短信互动常联系，祝你晚安甜如蜜！.
English_Sentence_3.5: Good friends are always united in heart and soul, staying together no matter the distance. Through all four seasons and all the challenges of life, they face everything together. When there is a lack of understanding in conversation, cold winds may blow and a kind word may be worth three. Family and friends always come together, weathering the storms side by side. True and deep bonds have a spiritual connection that is understood without words. Thoughts of loved ones are always kept close to the heart, staying connected through frequent messages. Wishing you a sweet goodnight!
English_Sentence_4o: Good friends are wholeheartedly devoted, together across the ends of the earth, sharing all four seasons, journeying through the storms of life, but when conversations falter, a cold wind rises; a single kind word tops three regular ones. Family and friends often gather, weathering storms together, soulmates with an unspoken understanding, deep thoughts hidden in the heart, frequently in touch through messages. Wishing you good night as sweet as honey!

Idiomatic_Sent: 拥有青春，我们将会善于做一个生活的有心人，从平淡中寻找激情，从美丽中获得感动，那么我们的生活就并不是“山重水复疑无路”，而是柳暗花明别有洞天了。
en_meaning: a difficult and treacherous path; also refers to a complex and difficult situation

English_Sentence_3.5: Having youth, we will be good at being a mindful person in life, finding passion in the ordinary, being touched by beauty, so our life is not "a difficult and treacherous path with no way out", but a hidden paradise beyond the willows and flowers.
English_Sentence_4o: With youth, we will be adept at living mindfully, finding passion in the ordinary and feeling moved by beauty; thus, our life will not be "a difficult and treacherous path with no end in sight," but rather "a place where the willows are dark and the flowers bright, revealing unexpected vistas."

Idiomatic_Sent: 原本在我心裡的一团疑惑，听了你的解说后，使我茅塞顿开，有如拨云见日。
en_meaning: "seeing the light at the end of the tunnel", "finding a solution or seeing hope after a difficult or challenging situation"

English_Sentence_3.5: Your Highness may not understand the abilities and courage that people can show when facing desperation. Since death is inevitable, many people will push their limits to the extreme. As the ancient saying goes, "An army that fights in desperation will surely win."
English_Sentence_4o: Your Highness may not understand the ability and courage people can display when faced with desperation. Since death is inevitable either way, many will bring out their full potential. As the ancient saying goes, an army that fights in desperation will surely win.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在敌人的法庭上，王若飞同志大义凛然，慷慨陈词。

English_Sentence_3.5: In the enemy's court, Comrade Wang Ruofei stood upright and righteous, passionately presenting his case.
English_Sentence_4o: In the enemy's court, Comrade Wang Ruofei stood upright and righteous, presenting his arguments generously.

Idiomatic_Sent: 对我来说，这是一次发人深省的练习。

English_Sentence_4o: To me, this was a thought-provoking exercise.

English_Sentence_4o: "That person speaks coyly and hesitantly, not at all straightforward."

Idiomatic_Sent: 前王之御时也，沐雨栉风，拯其溺而救其焚，信赏必罚，安而利之，既与共其存亡，故得同其生死。
en_meaning: rewarding those who deserve it and punishing those who deserve it
translation_instruction: '信赏必罚' means 'rewarding those who deserve it and punishing those who deserve it'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 前王之御时也，沐雨栉风，拯其溺而救其焚，信赏必罚，安而利之，既与共其存亡，故得同其生死。.
English_Sentence_3.5: During the reign of the former king, he endured hardships and dangers, saving those who were drowning and rescuing those who were burning. Rewarding those who deserve it and punishing those who deserve it, he made them secure and prosperous, and thus shared their life and death, gaining their same fate.
English_Sentence_4o: In the time of the former kings, they braved the elements, rescuing those in peril and saving those in distress, rewarding those who deserved it and punishing those who deserved it, providing security and benefit, sharing both prosperity and adversity, thus they were able to share life and death with the people.

Idiomatic_Sent: 高考在即，送去祝福，祝你在考场上，自信稳扎稳打，思路翻江倒海，智慧龙飞凤舞，大脑活蹦乱跳，心态四平八稳，钢笔翻飞疾书，成绩名列前茅，理想近在眼前。

English_Sentence_3.5: The college entrance examination is approaching. Sending you blessings, wishing you confidence, steady and stable in the examination room, with sharp thinking, wisdom, active brain, calm and stable mindset, writing swiftly with the pen, excelling in grades, and achieving your dreams.
English_Sentence_4o: The college entrance exam is approaching, sending you blessings—may you be confident and steady in the exam room, with ideas surging like turbulent waters, wisdom soaring like dragons and phoenixes, a mind lively and agile, mindset steady and stable, pen flying swiftly, achieving top results, with your aspirations within reach.

English_Sentence_4o: This matter affects your entire life; how can you not think thrice before you act?

Idiomatic_Sent: 这里的大多数家庭，算我们在内，都属于中下阶层，不象东部下城区的犹太人那样赤贫如洗。
en_meaning: extremely poor
translation_instruction: '赤贫如洗' means 'extremely poor'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 这里的大多数家庭，算我们在内，都属于中下阶层，不象东部下城区的犹太人那样赤贫如洗。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Most families here, including us, belong to the middle to lower class, not extremely poor like the Jewish people in the lower east side.
English_Sentence_4o: Most of the families here, including ours, belong to the lower-middle class, but are not as extremely poor as the Jews in the lower east side.

Idiomatic_Sent: 一年一度七夕日，牛郎织女鹊桥会。感天动地情深切，爱莫能助伤离别。你我凡间平常人，郎情妾意过一生。不羡鸳鸯不羡仙，安居乐业享团圆。
en_meaning: to be unable to offer assistance even though one wants to help
translation_instruction: '爱莫能助' means 'to be unable to offer assistance even though one wants to help'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 一年一度七夕日，牛郎织女鹊桥会。感天动地情深切，爱莫能助伤离别。你我凡间平常人，郎情妾意过一生。不羡鸳鸯不羡仙，安居乐业享团圆。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Once a year on the Qixi Festival, the Cowherd and the Weaver Girl meet on the Magpie Bridge. The deep and sincere feelings move heaven and earth, but they are unable to help the pain of separation. We are just ordinary people in the world, living our lives with love and affection. Not envying mandarin ducks or immortals, we find joy and contentment in our peaceful and reunited life.
English_Sentence_4o: Once a year, on the Qixi Festival, the Cowherd and the Weaver Girl meet on the Magpie Bridge. Their deep and touching love moves the heavens, yet being unable to help, they are pained by their separation. As ordinary people in the mortal world, we should live our lives with mutual love and affection. We do not envy mandarin ducks or immortals, but instead find happiness in a peaceful and harmonious life together.

Idiomatic_Sent: 十年寒窗终圆梦，九亲十故来庆贺，八斗之才真给力，七月金榜提名时，六街三市齐关注，五味俱全各品尝，四山五岳入高校，三五成群谈理想，二话不说勤奋斗，一心求知终成才！
en_meaning: limited talent or ability
translation_instruction: '八斗之才' means 'limited talent or ability'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 十年寒窗终圆梦，九亲十故来庆贺，八斗之才真给力，七月金榜提名时，六街三市齐关注，五味俱全各品尝，四山五岳入高校，三五成群谈理想，二话不说勤奋斗，一心求知终成才！.
English_Sentence_3.5: After ten years of studying hard, the dream finally comes true, relatives and friends come to celebrate, limited talent really comes through, nominated in July for the gold list, attention from all corners of town, tasting all flavors, entering universities from all over, discussing ideals in groups of three to five, working diligently without saying a word, finally becoming successful through seeking knowledge with one heart.
English_Sentence_4o: Ten years of hard study finally fulfilled the dream, relatives and friends gathered to celebrate, extraordinary talent truly paid off, in July the golden list named the successful candidates, six streets and three markets paid attention, experiencing all sorts of flavors, entering universities across the country, groups of friends discussing ideals, working hard without a second word, and wholeheartedly pursuing knowledge to achieve success!

Idiomatic_Sent: 以至公无私之心，行正大光明之事。 #吕坤#
en_meaning: honest and upright, in a fair and open manner
high_similarity_english_idioms: fair and square (0.73), on the square (0.78)

English_Sentence_3.5: With a heart of impartiality and selflessness, act with fairness and integrity. #LvKun#.
English_Sentence_4o: With a just and selfless heart, act in a fair and square manner. #Lu Kun#

Idiomatic_Sent: 将城市政府看作一个具有自己独立利益的经济实体，一个以经营城市为目标的企业，不仅仅是一种城市管理改革，更是经济改革的一大创举，它的产生不是人们心血来潮，而是有着市场经济发展的内在原因。
en_meaning: sudden impulse or inspiration
translation_instruction: '心血来潮' means 'sudden impulse or inspiration'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 将城市政府看作一个具有自己独立利益的经济实体，一个以经营城市为目标的企业，不仅仅是一种城市管理改革，更是经济改革的一大创举，它的产生不是人们心血来潮，而是有着市场经济发展的内在原因。.
English_Sentence_3.5: To view the city government as an economic entity with its own independent interests, as a business aiming to operate the city, is not just a reform in city management, but also a major innovation in economic reform. Its emergence is not a sudden impulse or inspiration, but has deep-rooted reasons in the development of the market economy.
English_Sentence_4o: Seeing the city government as an economic entity with its own independent interests, an enterprise aimed at managing the city, is not only a reform in urban management but also a significant economic innovation. Its emergence is not due to a sudden impulse or inspiration, but rather has inherent reasons rooted in the development of a market economy.

Idiomatic_Sent: 谁看得清你？既非门楼的敛眉顺目，温柔敦厚，亦非红砖白石主楼的富丽堂皇，威严肃穆。我只记得年少时，某个初夏雨后，在你的怀中，拾起的那枚白色玉兰，芬芳沁骨。 #李秋沅#
en_meaning: grand and magnificent in appearance or style
translation_instruction: '富丽堂皇' means 'grand and magnificent in appearance or style'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 谁看得清你？既非门楼的敛眉顺目，温柔敦厚，亦非红砖白石主楼的富丽堂皇，威严肃穆。我只记得年少时，某个初夏雨后，在你的怀中，拾起的那枚白色玉兰，芬芳沁骨。 #李秋沅#.
English_Sentence_3.5: Who can see through you? Not the gentle and kind appearance of the gatehouse, nor the grand and magnificent style of the main building with red bricks and white stones, imposing and solemn. I only remember the white magnolia picked up in your arms, fragrant and penetrating in the early summer rain of my youth. #Li Qiuyuan#.
English_Sentence_4o: Who can truly see you? Neither the modest elegance of the gatehouse nor the grand and magnificent solemnity of the red-brick and white-stone main building. I only remember in my youth, after an early summer rain, picking up that fragrant white magnolia in your embrace. #Li Qiuyuan#

Idiomatic_Sent: 在人世间，要幸福只有一条路。不是怀着大公无私的良心，便是完全不怀良心。
en_meaning: selfless and impartial
translation_instruction: '大公无私' means 'selfless and impartial'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 在人世间，要幸福只有一条路。不是怀着大公无私的良心，便是完全不怀良心。.
English_Sentence_3.5: In this world, there is only one path to happiness. It is either with a selfless and impartial conscience or with no conscience at all.
English_Sentence_4o: In this world, there is only one path to happiness: either with a selfless and impartial conscience or with no conscience at all.

Idiomatic_Sent: 风雨无情人有情，亲友关爱化残冰，困苦来临摇树影，艰险值得你叮咛，岁月蹉跎杨柳青，桃花潭水伴我行，天寒地冻血与风，唯你帮我数寒冷，肝胆相照喜气腾，幸福快乐绽花容，勤劳的你爱劳动，五一收获好风景！
en_meaning: be extremely close and loyal to each other, willing to sacrifice for each other
translation_instruction: '肝胆相照' means 'be extremely close and loyal to each other, willing to sacrifice for each other'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 风雨无情人有情，亲友关爱化残冰，困苦来临摇树影，艰险值得你叮咛，岁月蹉跎杨柳青，桃花潭水伴我行，天寒地冻血与风，唯你帮我数寒冷，肝胆相照喜气腾，幸福快乐绽花容，勤劳的你爱劳动，五一收获好风景！.
English_Sentence_3.5: Through thick and thin, friends and family care like melting ice, facing hardships shake the shadows, reminding you of the worthiness of perseverance, time passes, as the willows stay green, accompanied by the peach blossom pond, in the harsh weather, only you can count the cold, being extremely close and loyal brings joy and happiness, hardworking you love labor, May 1st brings good harvest!
English_Sentence_4o: Though wind and rain are ruthless, people are compassionate; the care of loved ones melts the remnant ice. When difficulties arise, they sway like shadows of trees; it's worth reminding you in times of peril. Despite the hardships over the years, willows turn green; the waters of Peach Blossom Pool accompany me. In the cold and frost, blood and wind combine; only you help me count the cold days. With loyalty and mutual support, joy flourishes; happiness blossoms with a smile. Industrious as you are, you love to work; may you reap a beautiful harvest on May Day!

Idiomatic_Sent: 拥有斗志的人始终保持乐观向上积极进取的心态，调整身心，不断完善自己的才能与实力，敢于拼搏挑战，这种人堪称智者。经不起放浪的人总是心灰意冷悲观怯懦以及自怨自艾，一遭打击就一蹶不振，此为无勇亦无智者。
en_meaning: to be unable to recover after a setback or failure
translation_instruction: '一蹶不振' means 'to be unable to recover after a setback or failure'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 拥有斗志的人始终保持乐观向上积极进取的心态，调整身心，不断完善自己的才能与实力，敢于拼搏挑战，这种人堪称智者。经不起放浪的人总是心灰意冷悲观怯懦以及自怨自艾，一遭打击就一蹶不振，此为无勇亦无智者。.
English_Sentence_3.5: People with determination always maintain an optimistic and positive attitude, adjust themselves physically and mentally, constantly improve their talents and skills, dare to challenge and strive, and can be called wise. Those who cannot withstand setbacks are always pessimistic, timid, self-pitying, and self-blaming, once they are hit by a blow, they are unable to recover, which is a sign of lack of courage and wisdom.
English_Sentence_4o: People with fighting spirit always maintain an optimistic, proactive attitude, adjust their mind and body, constantly improve their talents and strengths, and dare to strive and challenge; such people can be called wise. Those who cannot withstand indulgence often become despondent, pessimistic, cowardly, and self-pitying, and are unable to recover after a setback; these are neither brave nor wise people.

Idiomatic_Sent: 锲而舍之，朽木不折；锲而不舍，金石可镂。人类学会走路，也得学会摔跤，而且只有经过摔跤他才能学会走路。
en_meaning: perseverance; to keep working hard and not give up easily
translation_instruction: '锲而不舍' means 'perseverance; to keep working hard and not give up easily'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 锲而舍之，朽木不折；锲而不舍，金石可镂。人类学会走路，也得学会摔跤，而且只有经过摔跤他才能学会走路。.
English_Sentence_3.5: If you give up halfway, a rotten wood will not break; if you persevere, even a metal can be engraved. Humans learn to walk, but they also need to learn to fall, and only through falling can they learn to walk.
English_Sentence_4o: If you give up chiseling, even rotten wood will not break; if you do not give up, you can carve into metal and stone. Just as humans learn to walk, they must also learn to fall, and only by falling can they learn to walk.

Idiomatic_Sent: 他常苦口婆心地劝导我要好好学习。
en_meaning: giving sincere advice or heartfelt persuasion

English_Sentence_3.5: He often advises me sincerely and persuasively to study hard.
English_Sentence_4o: He often gives me heartfelt advice to study hard.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在谢泼德所处的时代，强盗在光天化日、众目睽睽之下拦路抢劫，还大摇大摆、得意洋洋地招摇过市，如入无人之境。
en_meaning: under the watchful eyes of the public, in full view of everyone
translation_instruction: '众目睽睽' means 'under the watchful eyes of the public, in full view of everyone'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 在谢泼德所处的时代，强盗在光天化日、众目睽睽之下拦路抢劫，还大摇大摆、得意洋洋地招摇过市，如入无人之境。.
English_Sentence_3.5: During the era Xie Po-de lived in, bandits would brazenly rob travelers in broad daylight, under the watchful eyes of the public, parading around arrogantly and shamelessly flaunting their ill-gotten gains as if they were in a lawless land.
English_Sentence_4o: In Shepard's era, robbers would waylay travelers in broad daylight and under the watchful eyes of the public, swaggering and flaunting their success as if they were in an unoccupied land.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在比赛中，我们应相机行事。
en_meaning: act with caution and consideration
high_similarity_english_idioms: throw caution to _ wind (0.75)
translation_instruction: '相机行事' means 'throw caution to _ wind'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 在比赛中，我们应相机行事。.
English_Sentence_3.5: In the game, we should throw caution to the wind.
English_Sentence_4o: In the competition, we should throw caution to the wind.

Idiomatic_Sent: 她外表妍姿艳质，冷若冰霜的气质却教人望而却步，如今佳人有难，正是大献殷勤的好机会……
en_meaning: beautiful and attractive appearance, with a graceful demeanor
high_similarity_english_idioms: easy on the eye (0.75)
translation_instruction: '妍姿艳质' means 'easy on the eye'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 她外表妍姿艳质，冷若冰霜的气质却教人望而却步，如今佳人有难，正是大献殷勤的好机会…….
English_Sentence_3.5: Her appearance is easy on the eye, but her cold and aloof demeanor makes people hesitate, now that the beauty is in trouble, it is a good opportunity to show kindness...
English_Sentence_4o: She is easy on the eye, but her icy demeanor keeps people at a distance. Now that she is in trouble, it's the perfect opportunity to show her some earnest attention...

Idiomatic_Sent: 大成若缺，其用不弊。大盈若冲，其用不穷。大直若屈。大巧若拙。大辩若讷。静胜躁，寒胜热。清静为天下正。
en_meaning: skillful and clever, appearing clumsy or naive
translation_instruction: '大巧若拙' means 'skillful and clever, appearing clumsy or naive'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 大成若缺，其用不弊。大盈若冲，其用不穷。大直若屈。大巧若拙。大辩若讷。静胜躁，寒胜热。清静为天下正。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Great proficiency appears deficient, yet its usefulness does not diminish. Great abundance appears empty, yet its usefulness is never exhausted. Great uprightness appears bent. Great skillfulness appears clumsy. Great eloquence appears awkward. Stillness conquers agitation, coldness conquers heat. Tranquility and stillness are the norms of the world.
English_Sentence_4o: Great accomplishment appears incomplete, yet its use is never exhausted. Great fullness appears empty, yet its use is never ended. Great straightness appears bent. Great skill appears clumsy. Great eloquence appears slow. Stillness overcomes agitation, cold overcomes heat. Clarity and tranquility set the standard for the world.

Idiomatic_Sent: 自小被母亲遗弃，寄人篱下，为生存养成卑躬屈膝，奉迎他人，却又急切想扬眉吐气的性格。
en_meaning: to humble oneself and submit to someone else's authority or demands
translation_instruction: '卑躬屈膝' means 'to humble oneself and submit to someone else's authority or demands'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 自小被母亲遗弃，寄人篱下，为生存养成卑躬屈膝，奉迎他人，却又急切想扬眉吐气的性格。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Abandoned by my mother since childhood and taken in by others for survival, I have developed a personality of humbling myself and submitting to others, yet I am eager to assert myself.
English_Sentence_4o: Abandoned by his mother since childhood and living under someone else's roof, he developed a submissive and ingratiating demeanor for survival, but also harbored an urgent desire to hold his head high and stand tall.

Idiomatic_Sent: 国庆普天同庆，三山五岳欢腾。自古国家一统，从来家国一体。家安国太平，家和万事兴。携手共建幸福长城，齐心同享美好人生。纵情放飞祝福，真心愿你幸福。祝你国庆快乐，合家安康，美满又幸福！
en_meaning: universal celebration
translation_instruction: '普天同庆' means 'universal celebration'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 国庆普天同庆，三山五岳欢腾。自古国家一统，从来家国一体。家安国太平，家和万事兴。携手共建幸福长城，齐心同享美好人生。纵情放飞祝福，真心愿你幸福。祝你国庆快乐，合家安康，美满又幸福！.
English_Sentence_3.5: On National Day, we celebrate together, with joy and excitement at the Three Mountains and Five Sacred Mountains. Since ancient times, when the country is united, the family and the nation are one. With a peaceful home, prosperity will follow. Let's join hands to build a happy Great Wall, and work together for a better life. Sending you heartfelt blessings and sincere wishes for happiness. Wishing you a happy National Day, with health and happiness for your family, and a fulfilling and happy life!
English_Sentence_4o: National Day is celebrated universally, with joy in every corner of the land. Since ancient times the nation has been unified, and families have always been integral to the country. When families are safe, the nation is peaceful; when families are harmonious, all endeavors prosper. Let us join hands to build a Great Wall of happiness, and together enjoy a wonderful life. Release your blessings freely, and sincerely wish you happiness. Wishing you a joyful National Day, and may your whole family be safe, healthy, and blissful!

Idiomatic_Sent: 朕躬广开言路，原要身致太平，不意廷臣所上奏本，类多毛举细故，无关宏旨。
en_meaning: irrelevant to the main point
translation_instruction: '无关宏旨' means 'irrelevant to the main point'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 朕躬广开言路，原要身致太平，不意廷臣所上奏本，类多毛举细故，无关宏旨。.

English_Sentence_3.5: Culture is like a book, can be read over and over again without getting tired; culture is like a flower, filling the garden with fragrance; culture is like wine, always mellow and fragrant; culture is like water, pure and good; culture is like drops, gathering into rivers and seas; culture is like a lamp, lighting up the darkness; culture with you, spreading everywhere!

Idiomatic_Sent: ——在吉野单纯又热血的心中，事业和媳妇儿已经牢牢的联系在一起了。这孩子没那么复杂的逻辑思维，他只能在事业和媳妇儿中间划一道长长的等号，然后默默的向事业这个目标奋力前进，即使已经头破血流都只会目视前方，永不停步。 #淮上#

This child doesn't have such complex logical thinking, he can only draw a long equal sign between his career and his wife, and then silently strive towards his career goal, even if head broken and blood flowing, he will only look ahead and never stop. # Huai Shang #.

Idiomatic_Sent: 有生之年，狭路相逢，终究不能幸免。无论时光停留在哪一处，只要我遇见你，兜兜转转，总是会爱上你。我不求长生，不求功名，我只想在最后的最后，当家国平安，当岁月静好，能和你在一起，永世不离。 #许维夏#

high_similarity_english_idioms: from the cradle to the grave (0.74)
Most_Relevant_English_Idiom: from the cradle to the grave
translation_instruction: '有生之年' means 'from the cradle to the grave'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 有生之年，狭路相逢，终究不能幸免。无论时光停留在哪一处，只要我遇见你，兜兜转转，总是会爱上你。我不求长生，不求功名，我只想在最后的最后，当家国平安，当岁月静好，能和你在一起，永世不离。 #许维夏#.

Wherever time may lead us, whenever I meet you, through twists and turns, I will always fall in love with you. I do not seek eternal life or fame, I only hope that in the end, when the country is at peace and time is calm, I can be with you forever. #Xu Wei Xia#.

I do not seek immortality, nor do I seek fame and fortune; I only wish that in the very end, when the nation is at peace and the years are serene, I can be with you, never to part for all eternity. #Xu Weixia#

Idiomatic_Sent: 夫谈讲之务，贵於名理，所以解疑辩惑，凿瞽开聋，使听者闻所未闻，视者见所未见。

Idiomatic_Sent: 天下兴亡，，有亡国，有亡天下，亡国与亡天下奚辩?曰：易姓改号，谓之亡国；仁义充塞而至于率兽食人，人将相食，谓之亡天下……保国者，其君其臣、肉食者谋之；保天下者，匹夫之贱，与有责焉耳矣! #顾炎武#

English_Sentence_3.5: The rise and fall of a nation, some decline of a nation, some decline of the world, what is the difference between the decline of a nation and the decline of the world? It is said that changing names and ruling is called the decline of a nation; when benevolence and righteousness are lost and people indulge in the same wrongdoing as beasts, with people preying on each other, it is called the decline of the world... Those who protect the nation, their rulers and officials, are planning to eat meat; those who protect the world are the lowly common people, and have a responsibility. #Gu Yanwu#.

The fall of a country is marked by a change of dynasties and titles, while the fall of the world is marked by the obstruction of benevolence and righteousness leading to indulgence in the same wrongdoing as others, and eventually, people cannibalizing each other. The protection of a country is the responsibility of its rulers, ministers, and privileged classes; the protection of the world is a responsibility shared by every common person. #GuYanWu#

Idiomatic_Sent: 能屈能伸：学会低头，退一步海阔天空，脸皮厚点，把丢脸看成是一种磨炼，别为小事较真。水流不腐，人“活”不输，做情绪的主人，调整心态。

Idiomatic_Sent: 俗话说：人不为己，天诛地灭，可俗话又说：君子以成人之美。可见俗话不是准则，为己还是舍己，还得自己掂量呐！
en_meaning: complete destruction or annihilation, wishing that the heavens and the earth would punish or eradicate

English_Sentence_3.5: The saying goes: If a person does not act for themselves, they will face complete destruction or annihilation, wishing that the heavens and the earth would punish or eradicate. However, another saying goes: A gentleman values the beauty of fulfilling others. This shows that common sayings are not always guidelines, whether to act for oneself or sacrifice oneself, one must weigh it themselves!
English_Sentence_4o: As the saying goes: "If one does not act for oneself, heaven and earth will obliterate them," but another saying goes: "A virtuous person helps others achieve their best." Thus, it is clear that proverbs are not absolute guidelines; whether you act for yourself or for others, you must weigh and decide for yourself!

Idiomatic_Sent: “我不在乎你曾有千娇百媚姹紫嫣红，我要的是，此后你只属于我一个人。”，“在我眼中，你已是千娇百媚姹紫嫣红。”。 #十四夜#

In my eyes, you are already charming, sweet, and lovable in various ways, and radiantly beautiful in myriad colors." #NightFourteen#

Idiomatic_Sent: 在现实触乎可及的物质利益面前，以及在岁月更替风雨飘摇中苟延残喘的一堆老祖宗遗物面前，家园可以是一堆新造崛起的钢筋混凝土结构的楼房，也可以是时间深处以对世间万物的审美和理解建立起来的精神系统。这是选择。人们会选择哪一种结果。前提来自他们认为哪一种更具备价值。
en_meaning: unstable or uncertain, going through hardships
translation_instruction: '风雨飘摇' means 'unstable or uncertain, going through hardships'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 在现实触乎可及的物质利益面前，以及在岁月更替风雨飘摇中苟延残喘的一堆老祖宗遗物面前，家园可以是一堆新造崛起的钢筋混凝土结构的楼房，也可以是时间深处以对世间万物的审美和理解建立起来的精神系统。这是选择。人们会选择哪一种结果。前提来自他们认为哪一种更具备价值。.
English_Sentence_3.5: In the face of tangible material interests in reality, and in the midst of the changes and hardships of time, the homeland can be a pile of newly built reinforced concrete structures, or a spiritual system established through aesthetic and understanding of the world. This is a choice. People will choose which outcome based on which they believe holds more value.

This is a choice. People will choose based on what they consider to hold greater value.

English_Sentence_3.5: Revolution is not a dinner party, not an essay, not a painting or embroidery; cannot be elegant and leisurely, calmly and gracefully, "gentlemanly," "courteous and refined." Revolution is an uprising, a violent action by which one class overthrows another.

English_Sentence_3.5: One speaks falsely, claiming words of the mouth that do not align with the heart, deceiving with falsehoods; two utters flowery words, using sweet words and flattery, harming cultural integrity; three speaks maliciously, insults and slanders, hurting others with malicious words; four speaks with a forked tongue, saying one thing to this person and another to that person, stirring up conflicts and misunderstandings.

Idiomatic_Sent: 一切都会过去，明天各人又将各奔前程。生命无所谓长短，无所谓欢乐哀愁，无所谓爱恨得失。一切都要过去，像那些花，那些流水。
en_meaning: Each go their separate ways and pursue their respective goals
translation_instruction: '各奔前程' means 'Each go their separate ways and pursue their respective goals'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 一切都会过去，明天各人又将各奔前程。生命无所谓长短，无所谓欢乐哀愁，无所谓爱恨得失。一切都要过去，像那些花，那些流水。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Everything will pass, and tomorrow each person will go their separate ways and pursue their respective goals. Life is neither long nor short, joyful nor sorrowful, full of love nor hate nor gain nor loss. Everything will pass, like those flowers, like that flowing water.
English_Sentence_4o: Everything will pass, and tomorrow each will go their separate ways. Life doesn't care about length, about joy and sorrow, about love and hate, gain and loss. Everything will pass, like those flowers, like that flowing water.

Idiomatic_Sent: 老张的散文文字优美，格调高雅，他的小说就相形见绌了。
en_meaning: pale in comparison, be overshadowed by someone/something else
translation_instruction: '相形见绌' means 'pale in comparison, be overshadowed by someone/something else'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 老张的散文文字优美，格调高雅，他的小说就相形见绌了。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Lao Zhang's prose is elegant and graceful, but his novels pale in comparison.
English_Sentence_4o: Old Zhang's prose is elegant and refined, which makes his novels pale in comparison.

Idiomatic_Sent: 宋军逢人便挑，遇马便刺，耀武扬威，如入无人之境。
en_meaning: showing off one's power and prestige
translation_instruction: '耀武扬威' means 'showing off one's power and prestige'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 宋军逢人便挑，遇马便刺，耀武扬威，如入无人之境。.
English_Sentence_3.5: The Song army provokes people at every opportunity, and kills horses at every encounter, showing off their power and prestige as if entering a deserted land.
English_Sentence_4o: The Song army challenged anyone on sight, stabbed any horse they encountered, showing off their power and prestige, as if they were in an uninhabited land.

Idiomatic_Sent: 当年始皇暴政，民不聊生，天怒人怨，人神共愤!焚书坑儒，大建长城，豪盖阿房宫，密修骊山陵园，四处寻找长生不老药。
en_meaning: a situation where the people are suffering and unable to make a living
translation_instruction: '民不聊生' means 'a situation where the people are suffering and unable to make a living'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 当年始皇暴政，民不聊生，天怒人怨，人神共愤!焚书坑儒，大建长城，豪盖阿房宫，密修骊山陵园，四处寻找长生不老药。.
English_Sentence_3.5: During the tyrannical rule of the First Emperor, the people were suffering and unable to make a living, angering both heaven and humanity! Books were burned, scholars were buried alive, the Great Wall was constructed, the extravagant Qin Shi Huang Palace was built, the mausoleum at Mount Li was secretly constructed, and the search for the elixir of immortality was carried out everywhere.
English_Sentence_4o: In those days, under Emperor Shihuang's tyrannical rule, the people were suffering and unable to make a living, causing both natural and human indignation, inciting widespread outrage among both humans and deities! He burned books and buried scholars alive, built the Great Wall on a grand scale, opulently constructed the Epang Palace, secretly constructed the Lishan Mausoleum, and searched everywhere for the elixir of immortality.

Idiomatic_Sent: 我有迫切的心情将周恩来总理晚年含辛茹苦、忍辱负重为祖国和人民所奉献的一切好好演绎出来，让观众更好地了解他的一生，也让我在与他晚年的交流和沟通中，更好地提升自己。
en_meaning: endure humiliation and shoulder heavy responsibilities
translation_instruction: '忍辱负重' means 'endure humiliation and shoulder heavy responsibilities'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 我有迫切的心情将周恩来总理晚年含辛茹苦、忍辱负重为祖国和人民所奉献的一切好好演绎出来，让观众更好地了解他的一生，也让我在与他晚年的交流和沟通中，更好地提升自己。.
English_Sentence_3.5: I am eager to portray the Prime Minister Zhou Enlai's late years of enduring hardships and shouldering heavy responsibilities for the country and the people, so that the audience can better understand his life, and so that I can improve myself through my communication and exchange with him in his later years.
English_Sentence_4o: I am eager to portray Premier Zhou Enlai's late years of enduring hardship and humiliation while shouldering heavy responsibilities for the sake of the country and the people, so that the audience can better understand his life, and to enhance myself through communicating and connecting with his late years.

Idiomatic_Sent: 岛上古树参天，浓荫蔽地，奇花异卉，沁人肺腑。
en_meaning: touching or moving to one's heart and soul
translation_instruction: '沁人肺腑' means 'touching or moving to one's heart and soul'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 岛上古树参天，浓荫蔽地，奇花异卉，沁人肺腑。.
English_Sentence_3.5: The ancient trees on the island tower to the sky, casting dense shade on the ground, with exotic flowers and plants that are touching to the heart and soul.
English_Sentence_4o: On the island, ancient trees tower to the sky, dense shade covers the ground, and rare flowers and exotic plants deeply move one's heart and soul.

Idiomatic_Sent: 妈妈一写文章一挥而就，我看了自愧不如。
en_meaning: feeling ashamed and inferior compared to others; feeling one's own shortcomings and not being as good as others
translation_instruction: '自愧不如' means 'feeling ashamed and inferior compared to others; feeling one's own shortcomings and not being as good as others'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 妈妈一写文章一挥而就，我看了自愧不如。.
English_Sentence_3.5: After my mom effortlessly finished writing an article, I felt ashamed and inferior compared to her.
English_Sentence_4o: Whenever Mom writes an article, she does it effortlessly, making me feel ashamed and inferior.

Idiomatic_Sent: 当身上的衣衫在时光中染得漆黑，已经无人在意多年前那个迷人的春夜。彼时月光如水，我们青春年少，品貌俱美。现在光阴如梭人渐老，我们耳闻目睹过一切罪恶，唯有理想再也不提。
en_meaning: seeing and hearing personally, being an eyewitness
translation_instruction: '耳闻目睹' means 'seeing and hearing personally, being an eyewitness'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 当身上的衣衫在时光中染得漆黑，已经无人在意多年前那个迷人的春夜。彼时月光如水，我们青春年少，品貌俱美。现在光阴如梭人渐老，我们耳闻目睹过一切罪恶，唯有理想再也不提。.
English_Sentence_3.5: As our clothes darken with time, no one cares about the enchanting spring night from years ago. Back then, moonlight was like water, and we were young and beautiful. Now, time flies and we witness all the evils, but our ideals are never mentioned again.
English_Sentence_4o: When the clothes on our bodies turned pitch black over time, no one cares anymore about that enchanting spring night from years ago. Back then, under moonlight as fluid as water, we were young and beautiful. Now, time flies and we age, we have seen and heard all the evils, but ideals are never mentioned again.

Idiomatic_Sent: 作为一名优秀的军事指挥员，要眼观六路，耳听八方。
en_meaning: being extremely vigilant and observant, paying attention to all directions and being cautious of potential threats or dangers
high_similarity_english_idioms: keep one's eyes peeled (0.75), keep your eyes peeled (0.74)

English_Sentence_3.5: As an outstanding military commander, one must keep one's eyes peeled and ears open in all directions.
English_Sentence_4o: As an excellent military commander, one must keep one's eyes peeled and ears open to everything around.

high_similarity_english_idioms: blow a fuse (0.81), blow a gasket (0.83), blow your top (0.89), fly off the handle (0.73), foam at the mouth (0.78), go ape shit (0.75), go ballistic (0.78), go spare (0.83), go through the roof (0.84), going nuts (0.76), have a cow (0.80), hit _ ceiling (0.83), hit _ roof (0.83), hit the ceiling (0.87), hit the roof (0.80), hot under the collar (0.75), lose _ head (0.75), make your blood boil (0.75), peed off (0.77), see red (0.88), spit blood (0.83), spit the dummy (0.75), throw a wobbly (0.79)

English_Sentence_4o: Look at him blowing a fuse, his face red and neck bulging, yelling until his voice is hoarse.

Idiomatic_Sent: 然而，夜郎自大，螳臂当车，终究不得善果……
en_meaning: having an arrogant and self-conceited attitude without realizing one's own limitations
translation_instruction: '夜郎自大' means 'having an arrogant and self-conceited attitude without realizing one's own limitations'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 然而，夜郎自大，螳臂当车，终究不得善果…….
English_Sentence_3.5: However, being arrogant and self-conceited like the ancient Yelang people, trying to stop a speeding chariot with one's arms, will ultimately not lead to a good outcome...
English_Sentence_4o: However, being arrogant and self-conceited like Yelang, and attempting the impossible like a mantis trying to stop a chariot, will ultimately lead to no good outcome...

Idiomatic_Sent: 她说，阿倾，富贵荣华人人趋之如骛，大权在握让人不惜代价不择手段，你要敌败众人，必须比他们更加不择手段！ #西西东东#
en_meaning: wealth and glory, living a luxurious and honored life

English_Sentence_3.5: She said, Ah Qing, everyone pursues wealth and glory, living a luxurious and honored life. Holding great power makes people willing to sacrifice at any cost, resorting to any means necessary. If you want to defeat the crowd, you must be even more ruthless than them! #WestEast#
English_Sentence_4o: She said, Ah Qing, everyone yearns for wealth and glory, and people will stop at nothing for power; to defeat your opponents, you must be even more ruthless than they are! #XixiDongdong.

Idiomatic_Sent: 不要看他一副玩世不恭的样子，其实他在幽默谈笑间，往往就能折冲尊俎，和人化敌为友。
en_meaning: being cynical or disrespectful towards the world and its conventions
translation_instruction: '玩世不恭' means 'being cynical or disrespectful towards the world and its conventions'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 不要看他一副玩世不恭的样子，其实他在幽默谈笑间，往往就能折冲尊俎，和人化敌为友。.
English_Sentence_3.5: Don't be fooled by his cynical appearance, in reality, he is able to win over others with his humorous banter and charm, often turning enemies into friends.
English_Sentence_4o: Don't be fooled by his cynical demeanor; in reality, he often defuses conflicts and turns enemies into friends through his humor and casual conversations.

Idiomatic_Sent: 想必总督大人也知道了，近来帝都正在清查里通外国的奸细，支持的正是云济大人。

English_Sentence_4o: Presumably, Your Excellency must also be aware that the imperial capital has recently been investigating spies colluding with foreign countries, and the one supporting this is Lord Yun Ji.

Idiomatic_Sent: 小林刚来这里，人地生疏，形单影只，大家应当主动关心他。

English_Sentence_3.5: Lin just arrived here, feeling unfamiliar with people and places, feeling lonely, we should take the initiative to care for him.
English_Sentence_4o: Xiao Lin has just come here, he is unfamiliar with the people and the place, and he is all alone. Everyone should take the initiative to care about him.

Idiomatic_Sent: 在这场言辞论战的一个多月后，意大利的旷日持久的政治危机已经到了像一场玩具士兵在打仗，士兵高高举着剑，呼喊之声震天动地，但是他们就是不动手。
en_meaning: prolonged and time-consuming; lasting for a long time
high_similarity_english_idioms: at a stretch (0.77), in a coon's age (0.78)
translation_instruction: '旷日持久' means 'at a stretch'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: 在这场言辞论战的一个多月后，意大利的旷日持久的政治危机已经到了像一场玩具士兵在打仗，士兵高高举着剑，呼喊之声震天动地，但是他们就是不动手。.
English_Sentence_3.5: After more than a month of verbal battles, Italy's protracted political crisis has reached a standstill, like toy soldiers in a war, holding their swords high and shouting loudly, but refusing to act.
English_Sentence_4o: After more than a month of verbal battles, Italy's prolonged political crisis has reached a state where it resembles a war of toy soldiers, with soldiers holding their swords high and shouting thunderously, yet not taking any action.

Idiomatic_Sent: “正衣冠”光靠自己不行，还需要虚心听取官兵意见，自觉接受官兵监督，从而防微杜渐，避免“积羽沉舟，群轻折轴”，始终保持共产党人的纯洁性和先进性。
en_meaning: Take precautions and prevent problems before they become serious
high_similarity_english_idioms: better safe than sorry (0.75), lock the stable door after the horse has bolted (0.74)
translation_instruction: '防微杜渐' means 'better safe than sorry'. Given the above knowledge translate this sentence to English: “正衣冠”光靠自己不行，还需要虚心听取官兵意见，自觉接受官兵监督，从而防微杜渐，避免“积羽沉舟，群轻折轴”，始终保持共产党人的纯洁性和先进性。.
English_Sentence_3.5: "Just relying on oneself is not enough in order to maintain propriety, it is also necessary to humbly listen to the opinions of officials and soldiers, willingly accept their supervision, so as to be better safe than sorry and avoid sinking into extravagance and loss, always maintaining the purity and advanced nature of a Communist."
English_Sentence_4o: "Merely dressing properly oneself is not enough; it is also necessary to humbly listen to the opinions of officers and soldiers, consciously accept their supervision, thereby nipping problems in the bud to avoid 'accumulating feathers sinking the boat, many small things breaking the axle,' and to always maintain the purity and advancement of the Communist Party members."

English_Sentence_3.5: At that time, the scene in Ganyu City was one of joyful singing and dancing, and people were joyful and horses were neighing.
English_Sentence_4o: At this moment, the city of Ganyu is a scene of joyful singing and dancing, with people cheering and horses neighing.
